caption.p: Phytotoxic activity of M. pulegium leaves (MPLIII) and flowers (MPFIII) EOs against germination of P. oleracea, R.sativus, and S. lycopersicum 120 h after sowing. Results are the mean of three experiments ± standard deviation. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001, compared with control (ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s multiple comparison test).
